Class PreCounterThread.MovingAverage

    • operators.PreCounterThread.MovingAverage
  • Enclosing class:
    PreCounterThread

    private class PreCounterThread.MovingAverage
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class MovingAverage. Contains double values in linked list and methods for counting average of values.
